text:
HomeBuilder Grants (Amendment of Act) Order 2021

I make the following order under section 19(1) of the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 .

29 April 2021

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the HomeBuilder Grants (Amendment of Act) Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order is taken to have taken effect on 4 June 2020.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 April 2021

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
